D:\\Sem6\\Labs\\MLT.description: This folder, located at D:\Sem6\Labs\MLT, contains materials related to a Machine Learning and Technology (MLT) course, likely from the sixth semester.  It holds a mix of documents and data files, including 17 files and one subfolder.  The majority of files (7) are PDFs, while 6 are Word documents (.docx), and there's a single Excel file.  The files appear to be associated with exercises (Ex1a, Ex1b, Ex2), possibly assignments or lab work,  featuring different file types like Jupyter notebooks (.ipynb) and their corresponding PDF and Word document outputs. The largest file is a PDF (over 1MB) and the total size of all files is over 3MB (excluding subfolder contents).  The "Unknown" file type suggests some files may not have been properly identified.

D:\\projects\\CAT.description: This folder contains a mix of files related to a project, likely involving data analysis and possibly video recording.  There are 122 files and 79 subfolders in total.  The main types of files are Python scripts (8 files), Excel spreadsheets (6 files), and MP4 video files (3 files), along with a few other miscellaneous files like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and a README file. The largest file is a video file (38.5 MB).  The Python scripts suggest some coding work was done, possibly related to data analysis or machine learning given the presence of files like `Dataset_Gen.py` and `pred_difficulty.py`. The Excel files may contain datasets used in the analysis. The overall size of the folder's contents is substantial given the presence of a large video file.
